name: First International Conference on Challenges and Opportunities for Development of Smart Cities 2020
content: The ICCODS 2020 aims for a great gathering of both industrial and academic professional from across the world in the diverse fields of Science, Engineering and Technology. It provides a major forum for the exchange of information among practicing professionals from all over the globe in the areas of greater importance such as smart city, environmental and energy. The Objectives of the ICCODS 2020 are focus on the various aspects & difficulties of smart city urban development, power, energy, infrastructure, transport, technology, network & communication technology, etc and discussion with renovation of existing cities, provide possible solution to the technological ecosystem in smart cities, Identify alternative energy sources to make smart cities financially and ecologically viable and Integrate existing technologies with cloud/fog computing and to provide IoT/IoE enabled environment. All the accepted papers of ICCODS 2020 will be published in the Scopus indexed Journals.
